title: Spinach and Cheese Bake
ingredients: ['900g spinach, rinsed and chopped', '225g feta cheese, crumbled', '1 (250g) tub cottage cheese', '1 small onion, chopped', '3/4 teaspoon chicken seasoning', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh dill', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', 'salt to taste', '215g breadcrumbs', '60g butter, melted']
